summary: A cross-dressing rich heir meets a jellyfish geek in an incident that comes to turn the lives of several roommates inside out.
cast: Non|Masaki Suda|Hiroki Hasegawa|Chizuru Ikewaki|Rina Ohta|Tomoe Shinohara|Azusa Babazono|Mokomichi Hayami|Akiko Higashimura|Sei Hiraizumi|Nana Katase|Tomoya Nakamura|Kenta Uchino
title: Kurage hime
